[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-datasource-protocol](./harp-datasource-protocol.md) &gt; [ITileDecoder](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiledecoder.md) &gt; [configure](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiledecoder.configure.md)

## ITileDecoder.configure() method

Set decoder configuration.

Configuration will take effect for next calls to results of \[\[decodeTile\]\], \[\[decodeThemedTile\]\].

Non-existing (`undefined`<!-- -->) options (including styleSet) are not changed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
configure(styleSet?: StyleSet, definitions?: Definitions, languages?: string[], options?: OptionsMap): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  styleSet | [StyleSet](./harp-datasource-protocol.styleset.md) | optional, new style set. |
|  definitions | [Definitions](./harp-datasource-protocol.definitions.md) | optional, definitions used to resolve references in <code>styleSet</code> |
|  languages | string\[\] | optional, language list |
|  options | [OptionsMap](./harp-datasource-protocol.optionsmap.md) | optional, new options - shape is specific for each decoder |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
